item.description:
When Law Of Attraction is not working to attract the "good" stuff to you, what do you tend to do? Wonder what you're doing wrong? Do you start going down the rabbit hole of negative thinking over & over, & get caught in the trap of repeating sabotaging patterns, even though you might not want to?

Come learn from EFT Expert, Kate Beeders about the transformational power of Matrix ReImprinting, where you'll learn what a limiting belief is, where they come from & how you can actually rewrite them!...resulting in getting unstuck, creating transformation, attracting the joy & successes you desire.

***************************************************
About Kate Beeders 
email: info@successcoachingwithKate.com 
website: www.successcoachingwithKate.com

Kate was a featured speaker for the 2011 Tapping World Summit, with over 300,000 listeners worldwide, a certified EFT/MTT, Matrix Reimprinting practitioner & a Success Coach helping solopreneurs make more money FAST!  She has several tapping certifications that have been awarded only to several hundred people in the world. Kate's radio show, "Tapping to Success" features internationally known experts.  She was recently acknowledged by New York Times & Hay House Best Selling Author, Sandra Anne Taylor, in her latest book about the Laws of Attraction. Kate will be a panelist for CEO Entrepreneur Magazine with an audience of 125,000 & was a guest expert for the Matrix Reimprinting teleseries.

She has developed a powerful technique which combines her business expertise, tapping & the Law of Attraction to help her clients get fast results: more clients, more opportunities, more money & more confidence.  Many even report their income doubles while working with Kate!

***************************************************

RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming. 

We provide handouts & have appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your understanding & support!

 ***************************************************

For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft : 

(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/

(2) Log in 

(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Change Your Limiting Beliefs with this Transformational Technique
